meanings.definition: A slight periodic variation in the inclination of the axis of a rotating object.
meanings.sent1: The nutations of the Earth's axis affect its climate.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the nutations of celestial bodies to understand their movements.
meanings.sent3: The nutations of the spinning top made it look like it was dancing.
meanings.sent4: The nutations of the gyroscope were mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent5: The nutations of the pendulum were so precise, they could be used to keep time.

meanings.sent1: The nutations of the tree branches in the wind were calming to watch.
meanings.sent2: The nutations of the dancer's head added grace to her performance.
meanings.sent3: The nutations of the bobblehead toy made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The nutations of the boat on the water gave it a sense of life.
meanings.sent5: The nutations of the metronome kept the musicians in perfect time.
